data.title: Transparent memory offloading: more memory at a fraction of the cost and power
data.description: -Transparent memory offloading (TMO) is Meta’s data center solution for offering more memory at a fraction of the cost and power of existing technologies -In production since 2021, TMO saves 20 percent to 32 percent of memory per server across millions of servers in our data center fleet We are witn…
data.author: Johannes Weiner
